doc:
Juanita Hansen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juanita_Hansen 0 Juanita C. Hansen (March 3, 1895 – September 26, 1961) was an American actress who performed in silent films. Beginning as one of the Sennett Bathing Beauties, she appeared in a variety of serials through the late 1910s. She was well known for her troubled personal life and struggle with addiction to cocaine and morphine. In 1934, she became clean and traveled lecturing on the evils of drugs. She wrote a book about addiction and started her own charity to help raise awareness about drug abuse. Juanita_C._Hansen ( March_3_,_1895 – September_26_,_1961 ) was an_American_actress who performed in silent_films . Beginning as one of the_Sennett_Bathing_Beauties , she appeared in a_variety of serials through the_late_1910s . She was_well_known for her_troubled_personal_life_and_struggle with addiction to cocaine_and_morphine . In 1934 , she became clean and traveled_lecturing on the_evils of drugs . She wrote a_book about addiction and started her_own_charity to_help_raise awareness about drug_abuse .
